title: My Hero Academia
overview: A superhero-loving boy without any powers is determined to enroll in a prestigious hero academy and learn what it really means to be a hero.

episodes.title: Save! Rescue Training!
episodes.overview: Four weeks after the League of Villains' attempt to assassinate All Might, the students of Class 1-A return to USJ to complete their disaster training. However, unbeknownst to the heroes-in-training, an unexpected foe is lurking within the facility's walls and waiting to strike...

episodes.title: Hero Notebook
episodes.overview: Recap of Boku no Hero Academia's first season, aired a week before the second season.

episodes.title: Training of the Dead
episodes.overview: Story about a joint practice session between Izuku's class and Isami High students at U. A. Academy, takes place after the field training arc in the second season.

episodes.title: My Hero Academia: The Two Heroes
episodes.overview: The climactic finals are over, and U.A. is getting ready for the summer training camp. Deku and All Might receive an invitation from a certain person to go overseas to a giant artificial moving city called I-Island. This island, a kind of “science Hollywood” that gathers the knowledge of scientists from around the world, is holding an exhibition called I-Expo showcasing the results of Quirk and hero item research. In the midst of all this, Deku meets a Quirkless girl named Melissa and remembers his own Quirkless past. Out of the blue, the impregnable security system the island boasts is hacked by villains, and all the people on the island are taken as hostages! Now, a plan that could shake hero society has been put into motion! The man who holds the key to it all is the number one hero and Symbol of Peace, All Might.

episodes.title: All Might: Rising
episodes.overview: Young All Might sees his mentor, Nana Shimura, be defeated by One For All.

episodes.title: My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising
episodes.overview: Deku and the rest of the heroes of Class 1-A must save a group of islanders from Nine, the strongest villain yet.

episodes.title: Make It! Do-or-Die Survival Training, Part 1
episodes.overview: UA's sophomore students are undergoing targeted training to prepare for their provisional license exams, and today they will have to take part in a rescue operation. This is just a simulation, but teamwork will be required in order to succeed in the exercise. Except that as soon as the mission begins, a landslide changes the game. The ten students who had split into several groups find themselves trapped by debris. Is this accident part of the exercise? Will the students come out of it unharmed? The survival test has just begun.

episodes.title: Make It! Do-or-Die Survival Training, Part 2
episodes.overview: In preparation for the provisional license exam, UA's 10th grade students are participating in a simulated rescue, but the rescue has gone wrong and the students are now trapped in an underground shopping mall. As if the situation wasn't complicated enough, water starts seeping through the walls. The students have to get out of here as soon as possible. That said, Bakugo still takes the mission very seriously and refuses to go out without finding and evacuating the rescue dummy. The water is rising dangerously. Will they be able to evacuate and avoid the disaster?

episodes.title: Izuku Midoriya: Origin
episodes.overview: Izuku Midoriya desperately wants to be a hero, but he is one of the few in his generation born without a Quirk. Will meeting the number one hero, All Might, change his fate?

episodes.title: What It Takes to Be a Hero
episodes.overview: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might's secret, but there's trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it. Will All Might be able to save the day again?

episodes.title: Roaring Muscles
episodes.overview: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

episodes.title: Start Line
episodes.overview: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

episodes.title: What I Can Do for Now
episodes.overview: It's Izuku's first day of high school, and he still can't control his new Quirk. Will he make it to the second day of school with his eccentric new teacher?

episodes.title: Rage, You Damn Nerd
episodes.overview: Izuku somehow gets through his first day of school and falls into a regular schedule of classes and training at U.A. In their first class with All Might...

episodes.title: Deku vs. Kacchan
episodes.overview: In All Might's first class, Izuku will have to face off against Katsuki! As the hero team, can Izuku and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya?

episodes.title: Bakugo's Start Line
episodes.overview: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

episodes.title: Yeah, Just Do Your Best, Iida!
episodes.overview: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

episodes.title: Encounter With the Unknown
episodes.overview: Villains have attacked USJ, and it's up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

episodes.title: Game Over
episodes.overview: The students fight for their lives against the Villains while Iida manages to escape with his friends' help. Once knowing that Iida will warn the other teachers who will come to stop them, the Villains' leader Tomura Shigaraki decides to kill Izuku and his friends just to hurt All Might's pride before they leave, when All Might himself appears.

episodes.title: All Might
episodes.overview: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

episodes.title: In Each of Our Hearts
episodes.overview: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.

episodes.title: That's the Idea, Ochaco
episodes.overview: As U.A. students and teachers recover from the League of Villains attack on USJ, Izuku learns about why Ochaco wants to become a hero.

episodes.title: Roaring Sports Festival
episodes.overview: The U.A. sports festival begins and all eyes are on the first-years as they start their qualifying round—the obstacle course race.

episodes.title: In Their Own Quirky Ways
episodes.overview: The first-years try to stand out as they struggle to finish the obstacle course and qualify for a spot in the next round.

episodes.title: Strategy, Strategy, Strategy
episodes.overview: Izuku's having trouble finding a team for the cavalry battle in the next round of the U.A. sports festival. Luckily, he has a plan.

episodes.title: Cavalry Battle Finale
episodes.overview: The teams are fighting it out in the second half of the cavalry battle. Will Team Midoriya be able to keep their place in the top four?

episodes.title: The Boy Born with Everything
episodes.overview: Izuku learns more about Todoroki's past as the first-years head into the final round of the sports festival.

episodes.title: Victory or Defeat
episodes.overview: Izuku is up against Shinso in the first match of the finals, but how will he overcome Shinso's Quirk to advance to the next round?

episodes.title: Battle on, Challengers!
episodes.overview: It's one match after another in the first round of the finals tournament. Who will advance to the second round?

episodes.title: Bakugo vs. Uraraka
episodes.overview: Bakugo seems almost villainous when he's up against Uraraka, but she has a plan to keep it from being a one-sided match.

episodes.title: Shoto Todoroki: Origin
episodes.overview: Izuku forces Todoroki to face his past in a chilling battle as the two class rivals finally go head to head!

episodes.title: Fight on, Iida
episodes.overview: It’s class rep versus child prodigy as Iida and Todoroki square off. Will Iida's Reciproburst be enough to beat the boy of fire and ice?

episodes.title: Todoroki vs. Bakugo
episodes.overview: The explosive showdown between Todoroki and Bakugo begins. Only one can take the title of first-year champion!

episodes.title: Time to Pick Some Names
episodes.overview: Following their epic debut at the sports festival, it’s time for the first-years to pick the most important part of their identities—their hero name!

episodes.title: Bizarre! Gran Torino Appears
episodes.overview: The internships begin! While everyone adjusts to their new tasks, Izuku starts training with Gran Torino, the same man who once taught All Might.

episodes.title: Midoriya and Shigaraki
episodes.overview: The U.A. students are finally starting to get the hang of their internships, but Izuku has much more to learn about One For All.

episodes.title: Hero Killer: Stain vs. U.A. Students
episodes.overview: Stain strikes again, and this time some U.A. students are around when it happens. Will they be able to hold him off until the pros come?

episodes.title: Climax
episodes.overview: It all comes to a head as Izuku, Iida, and Todoroki face off against Stain while the pro heroes in Hosu City fight against the Nomus.

episodes.title: The Aftermath of Hero Killer: Stain
episodes.overview: Stain is finally captured, but now the hero community must deal with the consequences of their actions.

episodes.title: Everyone's Internships
episodes.overview: As Izuku, Iida, and Todoroki recover from their fight with Stain, the other members of Class 1-A work hard at their own internships.

episodes.title: Listen Up!! A Tale from the Past
episodes.overview: The students return to their daily lives while All Might has a special history lesson for Izuku. It’s time to learn about One For All!

episodes.title: Gear Up for Final Exams
episodes.overview: Finals are coming up and Class 1-A is going to need more than a cram session. This year, the teachers are changing the practical exams.

episodes.title: Yaoyorozu: Rising
episodes.overview: The exams are turning out to be much more challenging than the students expected. Can any of the teams hold their own against a teacher?

episodes.title: Stripping the Varnish
episodes.overview: As the students of Class 1-A fight in their practical exams, their resolve to become heroes is put to the test.

episodes.title: Katsuki Bakugo: Origin
episodes.overview: It's finally time for Izuku and Bakugo's practical exam. How can they challenge All Might without a plan?

episodes.title: Encounter
episodes.overview: Class 1-A goes shopping for training camp supplies, but things get out of hand when a villain pulls Izuku aside.

episodes.title: Game Start
episodes.overview: Before the U.A. students head to their training camp, Class 1-A goes to the pool for extra training, and the League of Villains plots their next move.

episodes.title: Wild, Wild Pussycats
episodes.overview: Class 1-A faces the first challenge of their summer training camp when they have to fight their way through "The Beast's Forest" before lunch.

episodes.title: Kota
episodes.overview: Midoriya tries to talk with Kota as the first-years start their training in earnest. Little do they know what awaits them in the forest.

episodes.title: My Hero
episodes.overview: The villains launch their attack, and only Izuku knows where Kota is. Can he get to him in time?

episodes.title: Drive It Home, Iron Fist!!!
episodes.overview: Izuku finally makes it back to the training camp only to leave again with a message for Mandalay to broadcast.

episodes.title: Roaring Upheaval
episodes.overview: Students and teachers of UJS are still fighting in the woods, but the Vanguard avant-garde team has already accomplished its mission ...?!

episodes.title: What a Twist!
episodes.overview: The battle at the training camp concludes, and now the students and teachers of U.A. have to deal with the aftermath.

episodes.title: From Iida to Midoriya
episodes.overview: Todoroki, Kirishima, and Midoriya want to go after Bakugo, but the class rep is standing in their way. Meanwhile, Shigaraki makes Bakugo an offer…

episodes.title: All For One
episodes.overview: The heroes and U.A. students close in on the League of Villains' hideouts, but the League still has an ace up its sleeve…

episodes.title: Symbol of Peace
episodes.overview: As the fight against the League of Villains escalates, can the U.A. students get Bakugo out in time for All Might to make a big comeback?

episodes.title: One For All
episodes.overview: All Might's time is running out as he faces his ultimate nemesis head on. Will he finally be able to defeat All For One once and for all?

episodes.title: End of the Beginning, Beginning of the End
episodes.overview: After All Might and All For One's fight, the students go back home while the U.A. teachers decide how to deal with the aftermath.

episodes.title: Moving into Dorms
episodes.overview: The students of Class 1-A move into the dorms and have a competition to determine who has the best room as they settle in.

episodes.title: Create Those Ultimate Moves
episodes.overview: Class 1-A works on developing their Quirks and creating ultimate moves in order to get ready for the provisional hero licensing exam.

episodes.title: The Test
episodes.overview: Izuku and his classmates make some final adjustments to their ultimate moves and then head off to the provisional licensing exam.

episodes.title: Shiketsu High Lurking
episodes.overview: The provisional licensing exam has begun, and everyone's after Class 1-A! Can they last long enough to pass this first test?

episodes.title: Class 1-A
episodes.overview: Todoroki's on his own against Seijin High, and Yaoyorozu's group is pitted against Seiai Academy as they and the rest of Class 1-A fight to pass the first test.

episodes.title: RUSH!
episodes.overview: It's down to the final minutes of the first test of the provisional licensing exam and almost half of Class A is still left…

episodes.title: Rescue Exercises
episodes.overview: The second test of the provisional licensing exam has begun, and the hero candidates are suddenly thrust into a rescue operation.

episodes.title: Special Episode - Save the World with Love!
episodes.overview: We take a break from the provisional licensing exam to visit a class held before the summer training camp!

episodes.title: What's the Big Idea?
episodes.overview: The exam nears its end, but Izuku and the other hero candidates must fend off Gang Orca to finish the rescue mission.

episodes.title: A Talk About Your Quirk
episodes.overview: While the U.A. students finish up the provisional licensing exam and get their results, All Might has a talk with All For One.

episodes.title: Deku vs. Kacchan, Part 2
episodes.overview: Following the provisional licensing exam, Izuku tries out his Shoot Style on Bakugo as they have a heart-to-heart through their fight.

episodes.title: A Season for Encounters
episodes.overview: The world has changed for villains and heroes alike in the weeks after All Might's fight with All For One, and the U.A. students start their second semester.

episodes.title: Unrivaled
episodes.overview: The students of Class 1-A learn about work studies from the Big Three. Meanwhile, the villains also prepare their next steps.

episodes.title: The Scoop on U.A. Class 1-A
episodes.overview: After All Might announces his retirement, freelance reporter Taneo Tokuda goes to the dorms to investigate U.A. Class 1-A.

episodes.title: Overhaul
episodes.overview: Overhaul pays a visit to the League of Villains, and Midoriya tries to find a place to do his work study.

episodes.title: Boy Meets...
episodes.overview: Izuku battles Sir Nighteye so he can do his work study at Nighteye's agency, but Nighteye has someone else in mind to be All Might's successor...

episodes.title: Fighting Fate
episodes.overview: Izuku's mind is swirling with feelings from his work study, so he goes and talks to All Might about it and learns about All Might's fate.

episodes.title: Let's Go, Gutsy Red Riot
episodes.overview: The U.A. work study students go out with their respective heroes and become involved in some big fights.

episodes.title: An Unpleasant Talk
episodes.overview: The work study students from U.A. attend a meeting of heroes gathered by Sir Nighteye and leave with new resolve.

episodes.title: GO!!
episodes.overview: The work study students wait until the pro heroes find Eri and it's time to start the operation to save her.

episodes.title: Suneater of the Big Three
episodes.overview: The Shie Hassaikai is going all out to stop the heroes, and Suneater volunteers to take out the first batch of Eight Bullets members in their way.

episodes.title: Red Riot
episodes.overview: As the fight with the Shie Hassaikai continues, Kirishima has to face his past when he and Fat Gum get separated from the others.

episodes.title: Temp Squad
episodes.overview: The Hassaikai gets some help from the League of Villains as the heroes continue to make their way to Chisaki to rescue Eri.

episodes.title: Lemillion
episodes.overview: The League of Villains stay true to their name in their fight. Meanwhile, Togata catches up to Chisaki and Eri first...

episodes.title: Unforeseen Hope
episodes.overview: Izuku, Eraser Head, and Sir Nighteye finally reach the area where Chisaki and the others are and find Togata past his limit...

episodes.title: Infinite 100%
episodes.overview: As the fight with the Shie Hassaikai reaches its climax, Chisaki looks back on how it all started, and Izuku uses All For One at 100%.

episodes.title: Bright Future
episodes.overview: As the heroes deal with the aftermath of the fight with the Shie Hassaikai, the vehicle transporting Chisaki has an encounter with the League of Villains...

episodes.title: Smoldering Flames
episodes.overview: After the fight with the Shie Hassaikai, a new villain emerges, and the students who participated reflect on their own roles as future heroes.

episodes.title: Win Those Kids' Hearts
episodes.overview: Camie joins the provisional license training course and is added to the team working with the kids from Masegaki. Meanwhile, Endeavor has a serious talk with All Might. l

episodes.title: Relief for License Trainees
episodes.overview: The trainees bond with the precocious Masegaki kids and life at U.A. goes back to normal as autumn approaches, but Aoyama has been acting strangely...

episodes.title: School Festival
episodes.overview: Class 1-A needs to decide what they want to do for the upcoming school festival, and Midoriya and Togata pay Eri a visit at the hospital.

episodes.title: Prepping for the School Festival Is the Funnest Part
episodes.overview: Class 1-A assigns roles for their performance at the school festival, and Gentle starts preparing his next plan.

episodes.title: Golden Tips Imperial
episodes.overview: Eri visits U.A. while the students are preparing for the school festival, and Gentle finalizes his plans.

episodes.title: Deku vs. Gentle Criminal
episodes.overview: As Deku buys some last-minute supplies for the school festival, he encounters a mysterious man wrapped in a trench coat...

episodes.title: School Festival Start!!
episodes.overview: Izuku must stop Gentle Criminal and his partner, La Brava, or else the school festival will be cancelled.

episodes.title: Let It Flow! School Festival!
episodes.overview: Izuku rushes back to the school festival after his encounter with Gentle Criminal and La Brava, but will he make it in time for his performance?

episodes.title: Japanese Hero Billboard Chart
episodes.overview: It's time for the next Japanese Hero Billboard Chart rankings to be announced, and this time, all the top ten heroes make an appearance.

episodes.title: His Start
episodes.overview: Endeavor and Hawks are up against High-End, and it's Endeavor's chance to show the world what the new number one hero is like.

episodes.title: All Hands on Deck! Class 1-A
episodes.overview: There's an emergency drill at U.A. High School, and Class 1-A is requested to report for duty!

episodes.title: Vestiges
episodes.overview: After their fight with the Nomu, Hawks and Endeavor return to daily life, and Izuku dreams of One For All...

episodes.title: Clash! Class A vs. Class B!
episodes.overview: Class A and Class B are joined by a special guest as they battle it out during their joint combat training.

episodes.title: Make It Happen, Shinso!
episodes.overview: The Class A team tries to put Shinso and his new equipment to good use in the first match against Class B.

episodes.title: Operation New Improv Moves
episodes.overview: It's darkness versus darkness as Tokoyami and Kuroiro face off in the second match of the class battles!

episodes.title: Foresight
episodes.overview: Separated from her team, Yaoyorozu's leadership skills are put to the test in the second match of the class battles.

episodes.title: Match 3
episodes.overview: In the third match of the class battles, Honenuki leads the Class B team against a well-balanced Class A team.

episodes.title: Match 3 Conclusion
episodes.overview: It's still anybody's game as the the third match continues with an endurance battle between Todoroki and Tetsutetsu.

episodes.title: Early Bird!
episodes.overview: Bakugo shows a different side of himself in the fourth team match as the class battles continue.
